Name: Agriculture
Descrition: crop residues burning, enteric fermentation, manure management, indirect N2O emissions from agriculture

Name: Fuel exploitation
Descrition: Production transformation and refining of fuels

Name: Power Industry
Descrition: Power and heat generation plants (public & autoproducers)

Name: Processes
Descrition: Industrial processes (e.g. emissions from the production of cement, iron and steel, aluminum, chemicals, solvents, etc.)

Name: Waste
Descrition: Solid waste disposal and waste water treatment
